title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat, stir in egg-cheese mixture, and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Fry onions until golden, then add tomatoes.
Simmer sauce and add grilled chicken pieces.
Stir in cream and cook for 5 minutes before serving.
